SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Class WindowSizeChangeListener

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.WindowSizeChangeListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<Number>
public class WindowSizeChangeListener extends Object implements javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<Number>
This class implements a ChangeListener that maintains the aspect ratio and minimum size of a Stage window.
Since:
01/06/2023
Version:
3.0
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi

  • Constructor Details

    • WindowSizeChangeListener

      public WindowSizeChangeListener(javafx.stage.Stage stage, double minSizeProportion)
      Constructs a WindowSizeChangeListener object with the specified Stage and minimum size proportion.
      Parameters:
      stage - The Stage window to listen for size changes.
      minSizeProportion - The minimum size proportion of the screen.

    • WindowSizeChangeListener

      public WindowSizeChangeListener(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Constructs a WindowSizeChangeListener object with the specified Stage and the default minimum size proportion. The default minimum size proportion is set to 0.35.
      Parameters:
      stage - The Stage window to listen for size changes.

  • Method Details

    • changed

      public void changed(javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue<? extends Number> observable, Number oldValue, Number newValue)
      Called when the observed value changes. Maintains the aspect ratio and minimum size of the Stage window.
      Specified by:
      changed in interface javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<Number>
      Parameters:
      observable - The observable value.
      oldValue - The old value.
      newValue - The new value.

    • hasRightProportion

      private boolean hasRightProportion()
      Checks if the current stage has the correct aspect ratio.
      Returns:
      true if the stage has the correct aspect ratio, false otherwise.

    • keepHeightAspectRatio

      private boolean keepHeightAspectRatio(Number oldValue, Number newValue)
      Checks if the height of the stage should be adjusted while maintaining the aspect ratio.
      Parameters:
      oldValue - The old value of the height.
      newValue - The new value of the height.
      Returns:
      true if the height should be adjusted, false otherwise.

    • keepWidthAspectRatio

      private boolean keepWidthAspectRatio(Number oldValue, Number newValue)
      Checks if the width of the stage should be adjusted while maintaining the aspect ratio.
      Parameters:
      oldValue - The old value of the width.
      newValue - The new value of the width.
      Returns:
      true if the width should be adjusted, false otherwise.
